title: Textile Sample, "Capra"
medium: Medium: linen (50%) cotton (36%) rayon (9%) and goat hair (2%).  Technique: plain weave with grouped warps (single, doubled, and tripled).
description: White plain weave with grouped warps (single, double, triple, quadruple). Fine black goat's hair is loosely woven in the weft direction. Number 144.
